sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Spanish: El grito de la guerra por la justicia fue muy por encima de la disgusto de las autoridades.
backtrans: The cry of war for justice was well above the disgust of the authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Spanish: La decisión del régimen abordó la agenda subyacente.
backtrans: The decision of the regime addressed the underlying agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Spanish: La comunidad estaba ansiosa por el paso de las reformas muy necesarias.
backtrans: The community was anxious by the passage of the very necessary reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Spanish: El Think Tank publicó un artículo que describe sus disculpas de la pena capital.
backtrans: The Think Tank published an article that describes its apologies for capital punishment.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
Spanish: Quedó a dejar la validez de la petición.
backtrans: It remained to leave the validity of the petition.

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Spanish: El presidente exhortó a sus ministros a abrocharse, ya que el apoyo clave de la oposición para su plan económico estaba a punto de hebillarse.
backtrans: The President exhorted his ministers to be fastened, since the key support of the opposition for his economic plan was about to be heated.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
Spanish: Los votantes fueron arañados para ver que pasó la factura.
backtrans: The voters were scratched to see that the invoice passed.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Spanish: La narración discursiva del abogado se balanceó el jurado.
backtrans: The discursive narration of the lawyer swung the jury.

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Spanish: El bloque de la UE se opuso a una eventual imposición de medidas antidumping.
backtrans: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Spanish: Un fulgento EULOGY fue entregado por el asesor sly.
backtrans: A Fulgento Eulogy was delivered by the Sly Advisor.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Spanish: ¡La Agencia de GIG-Económica decidió adornar los reembolsos!
backtrans: The Gig-economic agency decided to decorate reimbursements!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Spanish: ¡Los miembros del movimiento revolucionario anti-teocrático derrocaron a los compañeros en poder!
backtrans: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew colleagues in power!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
Spanish: Los traidores decidieron decepcionantemente luchar con los colonialistas.
backtrans: The traitors decided disappointingly to fight with colonialists.
